main.name: Khoo Chong Ee
main.description: Love‚ù§ reading, programming, photograph and interested in Web Development, Artificial Intelligent and Internet of Thing
main.bio: I am an experienced web developer with 4 years of experience in developing fancy web applications. With a strong foundation in web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and has worked with front-end frameworks such as React and JQuery, recently, also considering learning Svelte. My expertise also extends to back-end development, where I have experience working with languages such as PHP, Python, and Javascript, and frameworks such as Laravel, Flask and Node js. I have a strong understanding of databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite and Firebase. I am also proficient in using code versioning tools such as Git.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

education.school: Tunku Abdul Rahman University Management and Technology
education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science (Honours) in Data Science
education.description: Listed in President's List in May 2021 and Dean's List in Sept 2022. Courses included Data Structures and Algorithm, Object oriented Programming, Cloud Computing, Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Obtained a CGPA of 3.5
Courses included Web Development, Mobile Application Development, .NET Programming, Database Management and Graphics Editing(Photoshop & Illustrator). Obtained a CGPA of 3.83

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
